caption.center: STATE OF HAWAI'I, Petitioner/Plaintiff-Appellee, v. TYLER CONDON,

opinion.posture: CERTIORARI TO THE INTERMEDIATE COURT OF APPEALS (CR. NO. 07-1-1275)
opinion.attorneys: Keith M. Kaneshiro, Prosecuting Attorney, James M. Anderson, Deputy Prosecuting Attorney, for petitioner/plaintiff-appellee, on the application.

center.underline: ORDER REJECTING APPLICATION FOR WRIT OF CERTIORARI

opinion.opinion_byline:
By: RECKTENWALD, C.J., for the court.[fn1]
[fn1] Considered by: Recktenwald, C.J., Nakayama, Acoba, and Duffy, JJ., and Circuit Judge Nishimura, assigned by reason of vacancy.
opinion.opinion_text: Petitioner/Plaintiff-Appellee State of Hawaii's application for writ of certiorari filed on October 13, 2010, is hereby rejected.Page 1
